meanings.definition: To scatter or spread in drops or small particles.
meanings.sent1: The paint splatters on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally splatters sauce on her shirt while cooking.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy splatters mud all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: The rain splatters against the window, creating a soothing sound.
meanings.sent5: The artist splatters colors on the wall, creating a beautiful mural.

meanings.definition: A spot or mark made by splattering.
meanings.sent1: There were red splatters of paint on the floor.
meanings.sent2: She noticed splatters of ink on the paper.
meanings.sent3: The chef's apron had tomato sauce splatters all over it.
meanings.sent4: The crime scene investigator found blood splatters on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The artist added gold splatters to the painting for a unique touch.
